title: 怎么检测正版账用户名号是否注册
author: MC—LaTaLe
txt_content: 怎么样在不注册的情况下检验

replies.author: fyfly
replies.txt_content:
https://namemc.com
如果已注册则显示is available

replies.author: fyfly
replies.txt_content:
fyfly 发表于 2015-8-19 18:06
https://namemc.com
如果已注册则显示is available
反了，如果未注册显示is available

replies.author: Chicken_sir2015
replies.txt_content:
用皮肤偷取器偷取id应该就行了
还有..你问这种东西干嘛....(犯罪心理学)

replies.author: cc58c58
replies.txt_content: 皮肤站弄角色 如果是正版他会提示是正版用户

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
http://skins.minecraft.net/MinecraftSkins/玩家id.png
修改玩家ID，出现皮肤代表被注册，如果是404则代表未注册
